featured.title: AgroSense - Smart Agriculture Platform
featured.subtitle: AI-Powered Agricultural Advisor for Lesotho Farmers
featured.description: AI-powered agricultural platform with crop disease detection, Sesotho voice commands, and offline-first architecture for rural connectivity.
featured.longDescription: AgroSense is a comprehensive agricultural platform designed specifically for Lesotho smallholder farmers. The system combines AI crop disease detection using GPT-4 Vision and Gemini, Sesotho language support with fuzzy keyword matching, weather integration, and offline-first PWA architecture for reliable rural connectivity.
featured.problem: Lesotho smallholder farmers lack access to agricultural expertise, struggle with crop disease identification, and face connectivity challenges in rural areas, leading to reduced yields and food security issues.
featured.solution: Developed an AI-powered platform with offline-first architecture that provides crop disease detection, Sesotho voice commands, weather integration, and farm management tools specifically designed for Lesotho's agricultural context.
approach: Conducted field research with farmers in Maseru & Leribe districts
Implemented multi-AI provider system (GPT-4, Gemini, Cohere) with fallback strategies
Built offline-first PWA with service workers and IndexedDB synchronization
Integrated OpenWeather API with localized agricultural recommendations
Designed Sesotho-first interface with fuzzy keyword matching for voice commands
Deployed scalable infrastructure on Vercel and Render with high uptime

challenges.solution: Implemented offline-first architecture with high sync success rate and offline availability

challenges.challenge: Multi-language AI accuracy for Sesotho speakers
challenges.solution: Built fuzzy keyword matching system and multi-provider AI fallback achieving high accuracy

challenges.challenge: Farmer adoption and usability for non-tech users
challenges.solution: Designed intuitive voice-first interface with high usability score

keyFeatures: AI crop disease detection using camera with high accuracy
Sesotho voice commands with fuzzy keyword matching
Offline-first PWA with background sync
Weather integration with agricultural recommendations
Multi-channel notifications (Push, Email, SMS via WASMS)
Farm management tools and historical tracking
Extension officer network and community features
Mobile app via Capacitor for Android/iOS

results.impact: UNDP AI Hackathon finalist with validated business model for government partnership and nationwide scaling potential.

architecture.ai: OpenAI GPT-4 Vision, Google Gemini, Cohere, Groq, HuggingFace

scalability.sustainability: Government partnership (M1M/year) + Freemium model + Strategic partnerships (M2-3M/year)

featured.title: Reusability Compass - Platform Insights Analyzer
featured.subtitle: GenAI-Powered Platform Adoption Analytics
featured.description: Production-grade full-stack application analyzing software platform reusability through automated surveys, GenAI insights, and interactive visualizations.
featured.longDescription: Enterprise-grade TypeScript application that transforms platform adoption challenges into actionable insights. Combines automated developer surveys, OpenAI GPT-4 analysis, and interactive D3.js heatmaps to quantify adoption friction and strategic value for platform teams and engineering leadership.
featured.problem: Platform teams lack visibility into component adoption friction, struggle to quantify strategic value of platform investments, and cannot transform qualitative developer feedback into structured insights for data-driven decisions.
featured.solution: Built comprehensive analytics platform with automated survey collection, GenAI-powered sentiment analysis, and interactive visualizations that transform developer feedback into executive-ready insights and adoption recommendations.
approach: Designed automated survey system for developer feedback collection
Integrated OpenAI GPT-4 for sentiment analysis and root cause extraction
Built interactive D3.js heatmap visualizing many-to-many platform relationships
Implemented real-time data synchronization with Supabase PostgreSQL
Created executive dashboard with strategic value assessments
Deployed production-ready architecture on Vercel and Render

challenges.solution: Implemented interactive D3.js heatmap with drill-down capabilities and real-time updates

challenges.challenge: Transforming qualitative feedback into quantitative insights
challenges.solution: Built GenAI pipeline with structured prompts for sentiment, friction scoring, and root cause analysis

challenges.challenge: Real-time data synchronization and lifecycle management
challenges.solution: Implemented automated survey → AI analysis → visualization pipeline with status tracking

keyFeatures: Automated developer survey collection with clean UI
OpenAI GPT-4 integration for sentiment analysis and friction scoring
Interactive D3.js heatmap with many-to-many relationship visualization
Real-time data synchronization with Supabase PostgreSQL
Executive dashboard with strategic value assessments
Automated survey lifecycle management (submitted → analyzed → visualized)
Root cause extraction and executive summary generation
Enterprise-grade error handling and fallback mechanisms

results.impact: Demonstrates enterprise software architecture, GenAI integration, and complex data visualization capabilities for platform engineering challenges.

architecture.frontend: React 18 + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS + Vite + shadcn/ui
architecture.database: Supabase PostgreSQL with Row Level Security
architecture.visualization: D3.js + Recharts for interactive charts and heatmaps

featured.title: Sesotho AI Platform
featured.subtitle: Production-Ready Sesotho Language AI for Lesotho
featured.description: Upcoming AI platform leveraging the Sesotho News Dataset for sentiment analysis and NLP tasks, addressing real Lesotho challenges with government partnership potential.
featured.longDescription: Production-ready Sesotho language AI platform using the gold-standard Sesotho News Dataset (4,651 headlines, Cohen's Kappa: 0.758-0.821). Designed to address real Lesotho challenges through sentiment analysis, social media monitoring, and government decision support for 1.85M Sesotho speakers in Lesotho and 38M Sotho-Tswana speakers regionally.
featured.problem: Limited Sesotho language AI support for 1.85M speakers in Lesotho, lack of sentiment analysis tools for government decision-making, and insufficient NLP resources for Sesotho-speaking communities.
featured.solution: Building production-ready Sesotho AI platform using gold-standard dataset for sentiment analysis, government decision support, and public service applications with AWS integration and nationwide deployment strategy.
approach: Implementing sentiment analysis and aspect-based sentiment analysis
Building government partnership for funding and nationwide access
Integrating AWS free tier for scalable AI capabilities
Designing public-facing applications for real Lesotho challenges
keyFeatures: Sesotho sentiment analysis with gold-standard accuracy
Aspect-based sentiment analysis for detailed insights
Government decision support dashboard
Social media monitoring for Sesotho content
News analysis and public opinion tracking
Educational AI assistant in Sesotho
Customer service chatbot for telecoms/banking

dataset.name: Sesotho News Dataset
dataset.authors: Refuoe Mokhosi, Casper-Shikali Shivachi, Matello Sethobane

potentialApplications: Government sentiment monitoring and decision support
Sesotho customer service chatbots for telecoms/banking
Educational AI assistant for schools and universities
News sentiment analysis and media insights

featured.title: E-Commerce Platform
featured.subtitle: Full-Stack Retail Management System
featured.description: Comprehensive e-commerce platform built with PHP and MySQL featuring product catalog, shopping cart, user authentication, order management, and admin dashboard.
featured.longDescription: Full-stack e-commerce solution developed as part of Web Design & Development module at Botho University. Features complete retail functionality including product management, user authentication, shopping cart, order processing, and administrative controls built with PHP, MySQL, and modern web technologies.
featured.problem: Need for comprehensive e-commerce solution demonstrating full-stack web development skills with modern retail functionality and secure user management.
featured.solution: Built complete e-commerce platform with product catalog, search functionality, secure authentication, shopping cart, order management, and admin dashboard using PHP and MySQL.
keyFeatures: Product catalog with search and filtering
Shopping cart functionality with session management
User authentication and authorization
Order management system
Admin dashboard for product and user management
Responsive design for mobile compatibility
Secure payment integration ready

architecture.security: PHP sessions, input validation, SQL injection prevention

additional.title: AWS IoT Solutions
additional.subtitle: Industrial IoT Monitoring Systems
additional.description: IoT solutions developed during internship at Sokul Automation using AWS IoT Core, Lambda, and DynamoDB for real-time sensor data processing and monitoring dashboards.

additional.title: Professional Portfolio Website
additional.subtitle: Modern React Portfolio with CMS
additional.description: Responsive portfolio website built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS featuring project showcases, skills matrix, and content management system.
